2074970.name: Very Easy Match3 Game
2074970.description:
In this game, you will enhance your character's abilities through match-three puzzles. Recruit teammates and upgrade their skills to face the ever-emerging monsters and the ultimate Boss.

Unlock your teammates' ability bonuses and pictures through continuous battles.

Finally, conquer the five challenging Bosses to unlock their ultimate animations and ability bonuses.

By purchasing this game, you will experience the unique sensation of combining relaxing match-three gameplay with thrilling battles. You can also enjoy the unlocked beautiful artwork of your teammates in the gallery.

Furthermore, I will continuously update the game with new characters, providing you with fresh unlocking goals.
